content: TROUBLEDThe Failed Promise of America’s Behavioral Treatment ProgramsBy Kenneth R. Rosen
source.name: The New York Times

author: By Marc Tracy
title: After hard times, The Jewish Week has a new owner.
description: 70 Faces Media, a nonprofit publisher of several Jewish-interest sites and a wire service, has purchased The Jewish Week.
content: Like many news publications, The Jewish Week was pummeled by the coronavirus pandemic. Now it has a new owner.
source.name: The New York Times

author: Compiled by John Otis
title: How Much Do You Know About Australia?
description: Can you find Australia on a map? What else do you know about this country between the Indian Ocean and the South Pacific Ocean with 25 million people?
content: Can you find Australia on a map? What else do you know about this country between the Indian Ocean and the South Pacific Ocean with 25 million people?
source.name: The New York Times

title: Read the Article of Impeachment
description: House Democrats on Monday introduced an article of impeachment charging President Trump with “high crimes and misdemeanors” for inciting the mob that assaulted the Capitol on Wednesday.
content: House Democrats on Monday introduced an article of impeachment charging President Trump with “high crimes and misdemeanors” for inciting the mob that assaulted the Capitol on Wednesday.
source.name: The New York Times

author: By Mattathias Schwartz
title: To Understand This Chaotic Transition, Rewind to the Last One
description: The handoff from Obama to Trump was fraught and unprecedented in ways the public didn’t see at the time. It was a prelude to so much that followed.
content: The handoff from Obama to Trump was fraught and unprecedented in ways the public didn’t see at the time. It was a prelude to so much that followed.
source.name: The New York Times

author: By David Marchese
title: Cicely Tyson Has a Secret About Living Life to the Fullest
description: “There’s so many facets to a human being. I surprise myself all the time.”
content: “There’s so many facets to a human being. I surprise myself all the time.”
source.name: The New York Times

title: What You Get for $3.5 Million in California
description: A Tudor Revival home in Los Angeles, a modern house in Palm Springs and a hillside retreat in San Clemente.
content: A Tudor Revival home in Los Angeles, a modern house in Palm Springs and a hillside retreat in San Clemente.
source.name: The New York Times

author: By Office Of Washington, D. C. Mayor
title: Washington Grapples With Coronavirus Surge
description: Mayor Muriel E. Bowser of Washington urged residents to be vigilant against the coronavirus on Monday, and announced that any resident 65 or older could make an appointment to receive the vaccine.
content: Mayor Muriel E. Bowser of Washington urged residents to be vigilant against the coronavirus on Monday, and announced that any resident 65 or older could make an appointment to receive the vaccine.
source.name: The New York Times

author: By NEW YORK CITY MAYOR'S OFFICE
title: ‘We Have Work to Do’: More New Yorkers Receive Vaccine
description: Mayor Bill de Blasio of New York announced on Monday that the city has begun administering coronavirus vaccines to residents aged 75 and older as well as a wider range of essential workers.
content: Mayor Bill de Blasio of New York announced on Monday that the city has begun administering coronavirus vaccines to residents aged 75 and older as well as a wider range of essential workers.
source.name: The New York Times

author: By Ainara Tiefenthäler
title: How Police Tried but Failed to Protect the Capitol
description: Law enforcement officers confronted with a crowd of Trump extremists unsuccessfully deployed a number of tactics in an effort to stop the mob from storming the Capitol building in Washington.
content: Law enforcement officers confronted with a crowd of Trump extremists unsuccessfully deployed a number of tactics in an effort to stop the mob from storming the Capitol building in Washington.
source.name: The New York Times

author: By Office Of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo
title: ‘We Will Win the Covid War,’ Says Cuomo in 2021 Agenda Speech
description: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York unveiled his 2021 agenda during his State of the State address on Monday, focusing on the coronavirus and its ramifications for the state.
content: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York unveiled his 2021 agenda during his State of the State address on Monday, focusing on the coronavirus and its ramifications for the state.
source.name: The New York Times

author: By Reuters
title: Madrid Struggles With Heaviest Snowfall in 50 Years
description: Madrid was blanketed with the heaviest snowfall in five decades after Storm Filomena covered the city and surrounding areas in Spain with more than a foot and a half of snow.
content: Madrid was blanketed with the heaviest snowfall in five decades after Storm Filomena covered the city and surrounding areas in Spain with more than a foot and a half of snow.
source.name: The New York Times

title: Impeach Trump? Weighing the Pros and Cons
description: “Those who say that impeachment will further divide us, or that impeachment must be delayed to facilitate President-elect Joe Biden’s agenda, are wrong,” one writer says. Others favor use of the 25th Amendment, pardons or a federal inquiry.
content: To the Editor:
source.name: The New York Times
